gantrytips.tip: The Background Patern setting allows you to easily change the patern in background of the site. Patern is independence from background color. You can use various combinations of patern and color.

The Background Color setting provides the ability to easily change the color used as the background. Colors can be inputted via the Colorchooser popup selector or manually using a hex code in the input field.
Module Header Background Color setting provides the ability to easily change the color used as the background for module header. Choosen color is combinated with special gradient.
The Module Header Color 1 setting provides the ability to easily change the text color in module header (for modules with gradient in background)
The Module Header Color 2 setting provides the ability to easily change the text color in module header (for modules without gradient in background)
The Headlines Color setting provides the ability to easily change the text color for headlines in main content.
The Footer Color setting provides the ability to easily change the text color in footer area.

The Link Color setting provides the ability to easily change the color used to highlight links. Colors can be inputted via the Colorchooser popup selector or manually using a hex code in the input field.
The Button Color setting provides the ability to easily change the background color in buttons.
The Button Color setting provides the ability to easily change the color for active elements in menu.

This setting allows you to use 3rd party WebFonts from providers such as Google. You must first set WebFonts to show and then save your changes, then the available WebFonts will appear in the Font Settings dropdown from where they can be selected.
A selection of fonts to be applied to your site's frontend is available from the Font Settings dropdown. It is also possible to set the Font Size according to your preference.
